snippet.title: Let’s! Revolution! - Official Release Date Trailer | Future of Play Direct 2023
snippet.description: Let’s! Revolution! will be available on July 19, 2023. Check out the latest trailer to see what to expect with this colorful roguelite Minesweeper mashup about overthrowing the narcissistic King of Beebom. Flip tiles to uncover the hidden path to the King. Use logic to avoid his cronies or take them all down in strategic turn-based combat.
